Help:
[CMD_KEY]prestige

Make you restart from 0, 
keeping few stats 
and having some bonuses :)
CNF: This action cannot be reverted, are you sure you want to prestige?
LowLevel: You need to be level %s or higher to go to the next prestige!
CantAfford: You need atleast %s %s to afford the next prestige!
Success: You successfully prestiged! You are now at prestige %s, congrats!
